snippet.title: “and Roger” 1st Trailer
snippet.description:
『and Roger』
Steam： https://store.steampowered.com/app/3308870/

It was a morning like all others, until she realized her dad wasn't home. 
In his place, a stranger who speaks nonsense and insists she "takes her medicine". 
Who is he? Where is dad?
Walk alongside her on this twisting, twisted path and see where it will lead her.

－－－－－－－－－－
Title:andRoger
Platform:Steam
Steam:https://store.steampowered.com/app/3308870/
Language:Japanese,English
Genre: Novel Adventure
Scheduled release date: Spring 2025
Suggested Retail Price: To be determined 
Players: 1
Developer：yona（X：https://x.com/Yona_unltb ）
Publisher：Kodansha Ltd.
